mapper.select: SELECT t.*, o.create_date_time as create_date_time FROM `top_summary_data` t LEFT JOIN original_top_summary_data o ON o.id = t.original_data_id WHERE content like CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') LIMIT 100

select `content`, `hots`, `link`, MAX(`mark`) as mark, `original_data_id` FROM ( SELECT t.`content`, t.`hots`, t.`link`, t.`mark`, t.`original_data_id` FROM `top_summary_data` AS t LEFT JOIN original_top_summary_data o ON t.original_data_id = o.id WHERE hots IN ( '沸', '爆' ) AND o.create_date_time BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} ) tmp GROUP BY content
